function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of training and education on pandemic preparedness and infection control","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers getting infected and spreading the disease","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training and education sessions, ensure access to updated information from reliable sources, and conduct regular drills for pandemic preparedness","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual reality simulations, and communication tools for remote training","People":"Nursing and medical staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospitals, healthcare organizations, and government health departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate availability of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers getting infected and spreading the disease","Mitigation":"Ensure sufficient stockpile of PPE, establish protocols for PPE usage, and implement regular monitoring of PPE supply and distribution","Technologies":"RFID tracking systems for PPE, automated inventory management systems, and PPE sterilization technologies","People":"Nursing and medical staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospitals, healthcare organizations, and government health departments"},{"Description":"Poor communication and collaboration between nursing and medical management teams","Impact":"Risk of inefficiencies in patient care and response to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Implement clear communication protocols, establish regular interdisciplinary meetings, and promote team-building activities for healthcare professionals","Technologies":"Collaboration software, teleconferencing tools, and digital communication platforms","People":"Nursing and medical management teams, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare organizations"}]}
